Title: Relates to establishing a death benefit for deputy sheriffs employed by Nassau county
Summary: Establishes a death benefit for deputy sheriffs employed by Nassau county entitling the sheriff's beneficiaries to receive in a lump sum an amount payable which shall equal the pension reserve that would have been established had the member retired on the date of his or her death.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to establishing a death benefit for deputy sheriffs employed by Nassau county
